categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Warlord was a member of an unknown alien species from an unknown system who became a tyrant on the world of Kariek around 28 BBY. He was defeated by the Imperial 501st Legion and Eickaries during the Battle of Kariek in 22 ABY. After his defeat by the 501st, the Empire of the Hand learned of the location of his home system from him, and sent a sizeable force to make contact.
